response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and efficiency. Given its immense value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am extending this exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to secure this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I am confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for your company. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
